title: Set up project environment
description: Initialize the project repository and configure dependencies.

title: Create main layout
description: Design the primary layout structure for the application.

title: Develop authentication module
description: Implement login, registration, and password recovery features.

title: Test API endpoints
description: Ensure all API endpoints respond correctly and handle edge cases.

title: Optimize app performance
description: Analyze and improve the app's speed and resource usage.

title: Write unit tests
description: Create unit tests for key components and features.

title: Set up CI/CD pipeline
description: Configure continuous integration and deployment for the project.

title: Fix responsive design issues
description: Resolve layout problems on smaller screens.

title: Deploy application to staging
description: Prepare and deploy the app to the staging environment for review.

title: Prepare user documentation
description: Write clear and concise documentation for end-users.
